mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysBrnd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BRND_ID , UPPER_BRND_ID , ERP_BRND_ID , ERP_BRND_GRP_ID , BRND_TAG_CD , BRND_TAG_NM , BRND_NM , BRND_DSCR , BRND_STORY_INTRCN_CONT , BRND_IMG_URL , MODEL_SIZE_IMG_URL , MODEL_SIZE_MOBILE_IMG_URL , SIZE_GD_HTML , SIZE_GD_MOBILE_HTML , USE_YN , ON_SALE_EXPSR_STDR_DC_RT , BRND_GRP_YN , OVSEA_BRND_YN , BRND_SALE_IDEX , SORT_SEQ , OVSEA_DLV_PSB_YN , EMP_ONLY_YN , PCH_PSB_SHOP_EXPSR_YN , CSMR_PRC_DC_RT , EMP_PRC_DC_RT , PNT_ACCML_YN , PNT_ACCML_RT , PNT_USE_YN , WEBPNT_ACCML_YN , WEBPNT_ACCML_RT , WEBPNT_USE_YN , IMDTL_DC_YN , IMDTL_DC_RT , IMG_RSIZE_GRP_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_BRND WHERE 1 = 1 AND BRND_ID = #{brndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysBrnd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_BRND WHERE 1 = 1 AND BRND_ID = #{brndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
